ygData.subject: RE: Is eq sexual harrasment racist?
ygData.msgSnippet: i ve found that most of the attitude problem players are either wizards or druids.... being kill stealers or/and kiters.  And my personnal favorite top hated
ygData.messageBody:
i've found that most of the attitude problem players are either wizards or
druids.... being kill stealers or/and kiters. And my personnal favorite top
hated is Barbarian shamans, i've only met one nice one of them so far. And
i agree, when i had my newbie troll i found that most of the trolls and
ogres i met were very friendly, then again, most newbies are as they havent
been exposed to kill stealing dungeons yet where they lose their innocence.

Minkin
Sol Ro

> sage-----
> From: Renee Cole [SMTP:nat_ive@...]
> Sent: October 8, 1999 4:24 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Is eq sexual harrasment racist?
>
> From: "Renee Cole" <nat_ive@...>
>
>
>
>
> >OK time for a new wrinkle on the stalker issue, have any of you who play
> >female characters noticed a trend in the race of the stalkers?
>
>
> Can't say as I've ever had much of a problem with stalkers. Had one high
> elf try it once with my wood elf druid. I sent him a tell that if he
> didnt
> stop it ASAP, i would /report him. He apologized quickly and never I
> heard
> from him again. I am female in RL, btw.
>
> Never had the problem on my wood elf bard from strangers. Get lots of
> teasing from flirting from the male members of my guild. But since I've
> known most of them for 3 RL years, its not quite the same thing.
>
> One thing I have noticed: for some reason, seems like more wood elves and
> high elves have attitude problems than the other races. Wood elf male
> bards
> being the worst. Of course, this is a subjective opinion. One thing for
> sure though, soon as my wood elf characters were old enough to travel, I
> left Fedwyr and rarely go back.
>
> As for Trolls and Ogres, I've found them to be some of the nicest folks
> you'd want to be around, so long as you can overlook their disgusting
> personal habits ;-P
>
> -Treehugger and Songmaker
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
> with the subject lol.
